tips: to upload a thingie, open the pocket and click upload (png, jpeg, mp3 & wav files accepted)
to move a thingie, click and drag it
to move a thingie between spaces, hold shift while dragging to drag and drop
to get rid of a thingie, drag and drop it into the open compost
to add a text thingie, hold option and click anywhere on the white space
to edit a thingie, click on it while holding option

in edit mode, a thingie can be rotated with ← and →, brought forward or sent backward with ↑ and ↓,
 or resized by making a pinch gesture while hovering over it
while editing, other options will appear to the right depending on the type of thingie
when audio is on, sound thingies can be heard by hovering over them with the mouse
